name: MotoGP™15 Compact
description: Experience the real MotoGP™! 18 tracks and the official 2015 liveries are waiting for you in the MotoGP™15 Compact, offering you the chance to race with your MotoGP™ heroes. Don't miss this opportunity!
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1 プロセッサー: Intel Core i3-530 @ 2.93 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 850 @ 3.30 GHz メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 @ 1GB / ATI Radeon HD 6790 @ 1GB* DirectX: Version 10 ストレージ: 10 GB 利用可能 サウンドカード: DirectX compatible 追記事項: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.
recommended_requirements: 推奨: OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-Bit / Windows 8 64-Bit / Windows 8.1 64-Bit プロセッサー: Intel Core i7-3770 @ 3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz グラフィック: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 290X* DirectX: Version 11 追記事項: *Laptop versions of graphics cards may work but are not officially supported.

reviews.review_text: This is the hardest racing game I've ever played. I'm getting canned on 'Very Easy'... I've turned off most of the help, like the guide line and steering assist, but still...In Forza that wouldn't be a problem. I usually find the guide line distracting. MotoGP 15 is a lot of fun. I appreciate the difficulty, I love motorcycle racing, the graphics are good, and I dont have anything to complain about. Especially at $10. If you want a game that's built around letting you win, skip this one. Otherwise gruel on.
